column2: Madison Square Garden Entertainment Corp. is engaged in entertainment business. The Company has a portfolio of venues and entertainment brands. The Company presents or hosts an array of events in its diverse collection of venues. The Company offers marquee entertainment content, dining and nightlife offerings, and a music festival. It operates in New York City, Chicago and Inglewood, California (CA). Its New York City venues are the Madison Square Garden Complex (which includes both The Garden and Hulu Theater at Madison Square Garden), Radio City Music Hall and the Beacon Theatre. Its portfolio of venues also includes the Forum in Inglewood, CA and The Chicago Theatre.
